# 1 Minute Academy
# This file helps LLM tools discover high-level entry points.

Site: https://1minuteacademy.vercel.app
Sitemap: https://1minuteacademy.vercel.app/sitemap.xml

Primary pages:
- https://1minuteacademy.vercel.app/
- https://1minuteacademy.vercel.app/topics
- https://1minuteacademy.vercel.app/pricing
- https://1minuteacademy.vercel.app/faq

Topics (published):
- Ask Clarifying Questions Early: https://1minuteacademy.vercel.app/topic/ai--agent-builder-lab--t-ask-clarifying-questions-early — A 1-minute de-risking session on Ask Clarifying Questions Early.
- Build an Eval Set Before Shipping: https://1minuteacademy.vercel.app/topic/ai--agent-builder-lab--t-build-an-eval-set-before-shipping — A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Build an Eval Set Before Shipping.

- Chunking: Smaller Isn't Always Better: https://1minuteacademy.vercel.app/topic/ai--agent-builder-lab--t-chunking-smaller-isn-t-always-better — One-minute skill: Chunking: Smaller Isn't Always Better.
- Citations: Show Your Sources: https://1minuteacademy.vercel.app/topic/ai--agent-builder-lab--t-citations-show-your-sources — Learn Citations: Show Your Sources in one minute.
- Confidence Checks Without Guessing: https://1minuteacademy.vercel.app/topic/ai--agent-builder-lab--t-confidence-checks-without-guessing — One-minute skill: Confidence Checks Without Guessing.
